author: The List
title: Karoline Leavitt's Sloppy Hairstyles Are Almost As Bad As Trump's | Flipboard
text:
Karoline Leavitt has a poor track record concerning her makeup routine which, and her hair apparently isn't immune to the press secretary's poor style and cosmetic judgement either.
Storyboard
Karoline Leavitt's Sloppy Hairstyles Are Almost As Bad As Trump's
Donald Trump's press secretary, Karoline Leavitt, has had more than her fair share of bad hair days.
Karoline Leavitt simply can't get her on-camera look right, with her hair at a recent White House press briefing looking completely disheveled.
Karoline Leavitt must have been a little rushed the morning of Dr. Oz's swearing-in, as social media users noted her hair looked unbrushed.
Karoline Leavitt's styling has caught the attention of many, and now her revamped hairstyle has left viewers wondering why she can't seemingly get it right.
We'll keep you up to date on politics, from who's making headlines to how those headlines affect you.
